sentences.sContent: Am I suggesting that we should return to the preindustrial mode of production or to nineteenth-century "free enterprise" capitalism?
sentences.sContent_eng: Am I suggesting that we should return to the preindustrial mode of production or to nineteenth-century "free enterprise" capitalism?
sentences.sCn: 我是否在建议我们应回到工业化前的生产模式或回到十九世纪"自由企业"资本主义时期呢？

sentences.sContent: Intelligibility was enhanced, not only by the steeply raked seating, but also by the naturally low background noise of a preindustrial society.
sentences.sContent_eng: Intelligibility was enhanced, not only by the steeply raked seating, but also by the naturally low background noise of a preindustrial society.
sentences.sCn: 不仅是急剧倾斜的座位，前工业化社会的低背景噪音都使语音清晰度得到了提高。

remMethod.val: pre(前) + industrial(工业的) → 工业化前的

trans.tranCn: 工业化前的；未工业化的
